text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Huff... huff... Last one!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Mejiro Dober is having a productive<n>summer training camp,
hitting all of her<n>targets with ease.

text_block_list.name: Student A
text_block_list.text:
Hey hey! Where do you want to start<n>at the festival tonight?
I'm kinda<n>feelin' some candied apples!

text_block_list.name: Student B
text_block_list.text:
Don't forget about the grilled carrots!<n>Oh man, nighttime
can't come soon<n>enough!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Everyone training around us appears<n>to be in high spirits. I
suspect that has<n>something to do with the festival that<n>will
be taking place nearby tonight.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Why are you staring at me so much?<n>Is there sand on my
face?
choice_data_list:
No... It's just that I can't help but feel that
you're the same as ever.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
What do you mean? Can you just<n>make sure to time my
next lap<n>properly?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Why would I be any different? I'm<n>going to go for another
lap, so please<n>keep my time.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A few hours after our training ends, I<n>wander into the camp
lodge. The halls<n>are eerily quiet, as most have likely<n>made
their way over to the festival.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A few hours after our training ends, I<n>wander into the camp
lodge. The halls<n>are eerily quiet, as most have likely<n>made
their way over to the festival.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Oh, Trainer? What are you doing<n>here?
choice_data_list: Are you not going to the festival?
Are you not going to the festival?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I have something to do, and the quiet<n>environment will help
me concentrate<n>on it.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Hey... By any chance, can you draw<n>landscapes?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Not exactly... I'm working on making<n>a paper play based on
the Veggie<n>Caroline movie.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Oh, no, sorry for not being clear. The<n>thing is... I'm working
on making a<n>paper play based on the Veggie<n>Caroline
movie.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
The kids aren't able to go see it<n>themselves. They're not at
an age<n>where they can sit still and quiet in a<n>movie
theater, you know?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
The kids aren't able to go see it<n>themselves. They're not at
an age<n>where they can sit still and quiet in a<n>movie
theater, you know?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
So I thought I could turn it into a paper<n>play that they can
enjoy as well.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I've drawn all of the characters, but<n>I'm nowhere near
finished with the<n>background landscapes. Even one<n>takes
a considerable time to draw.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Thinking back on it, the movie did take<n>place on an
abandoned island. The<n>landscapes around here would<n>
probably make for some great<n>references.
choice_data_list:
What if you took some pictures for your
backgrounds?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Wait, pictures? What do you mean?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
We've got access to a coastal area,<n>a forest, and even this
inn resembles<n>the abandoned lodge from the movie.<n>This
should work out well.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
We've got access to a coastal area,<n>a forest, and even this
inn resembles<n>the abandoned lodge from the movie.<n>This
should work out well.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Are you really just a trainer? That's<n>a great idea.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Trainer, you might be a genius.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
All I'll have to do after this is print the<n>photos out in a larger
size and hang<n>them up as my backgrounds!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
All I'll have to do after this is print the<n>photos out in a larger
size and hang<n>them up as my backgrounds!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Okay, I'll have to cut out all the<n>characters, bring them over
to the<n>beach, and then take the pictures.<n>Can I actually do
it all before everyone<n>gets back?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: ...I figured you would offer.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Yes, I expected the offer.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
And you're not the type to give up<n>after I refuse any help.
I'm starting to<n>understand that.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I remember before when you said<n>you would be willing to
help me out<n>with anything that was troubling me. I<n>was
likely going to ask for your help<n>directly.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Okay, let's meet in the common room<n>in five minutes.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Let's meet in the common area in<n>five minutes, then!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
We quickly cut out all of the<n>characters, and we have now
begun<n>our photography.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
We quickly cut out all of the<n>characters, and we have now
begun<n>our photography.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, scooch farther right! Stretch<n>your arms out as far as
you can,<n>otherwise you'll be in the picture!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Trainer? Something up with that<n>window? Oh, that's another
great<n>idea! If we lean them up against it we<n>can take the
picture as if they are<n>standing in the room!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I feel like we need more realism for<n>this running scene.
Trainer, can you do<n>some sprints for me?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Oh, you think we should put them<n>there? Nice idea! It's like
the<n>characters are hiding in the<n>environment. It should be
fun to have<n>them try and find them!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I'll have to wait until tomorrow to take<n>the daytime photos...
So that means<n>this will be our last photo of the night.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I'll have to wait until tomorrow to take<n>the daytime photos...
So that means<n>this will be our last photo of the night.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Try not to move, Trainer. Three, two,<n>one...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Got it. Okay!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Bang, boom!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Fireworks!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: I guess that festival's almost over,<n>then.
choice_data_list: Do you want to go check it out now?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
If we went now, all the stalls would<n>surely be closing up
shop for the night.<n>I asked Ryan and the others to get me<n>
some souvenirs.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I used to go to festivals with Ryan<n>and the other girls quite
often back in<n>the day.

text_block_list.name: Young Dober
text_block_list.text:
Wow, there are a lot of people here...<n>Ryan, you better not let
go of my hand,<n>okay?

text_block_list.name: Young Dober
text_block_list.text:
Oh, they have cotton candy! Ryan,<n>over there. See the cotton
candy? Hey,<n>let's get some!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: I would hold their hands and drag<n>them all over the place...
choice_data_list: You all are close, I take it.
You all are close, I take it.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
My mother was often busy with<n>work, so I would spend a
lot of my<n>time playing with the other Mejiro<n>girls.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Ryan was the responsible one, and I<n>always felt at ease
around her. I have<n>a lot of fond memories of the fun<n>times
we had.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
So when my sister and brother were<n>born, I decided that I
would try to be<n>the same for them.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
If I can somehow make them feel<n>just as happy and
content as I felt<n>back then...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
My chances are few and far between<n>now, however, as I
spend most of my<n>days at the academy and dorms.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
When I do get a chance to see them, I<n>often don't know
how to best treat<n>them.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I ended up drawing a Veggie Caroline<n>picture last time I was
there, and they<n>started to beg me to draw more.
choice_data_list: So that's why you were practicing so much.
So that's why you were practicing so much.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Right. It's something I can do fairly<n>well and share with
them. So now this<n>is...
choice_data_list: The paper play is the next big step.
The paper play is the next big step.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Palmer always brought out the paper<n>play theater when we
were younger.<n>Luckily, she still had it around. I had to<n>rely
on one of my big sisters one more<n>time.
choice_data_list:
You kind of have that big sister look to you as
well.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Now just what does that<n>mean? You're just playing
around,<n>right?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
A big sister look? I've never thought<n>of myself like that...
How do I give it<n>off?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I don't think so at all! But maybe if<n>they like the paper play,
then they'll<n>start viewing me as such, even if it's<n>just a
little bit...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I don't feel like a big sister at all, to<n>be honest. But maybe if
they like the<n>paper play, then they'll start viewing<n>me as
such, even if it's just a little<n>bit...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Anyway, I do owe you my gratitude.<n>I'll be sure to report
back on how it<n>goes after I return from my upcoming<n>trip.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
You've helped me so much with this,<n>so I feel like I owe
you a report on<n>how it goes after I return from my<n>
upcoming trip.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Let's get back. The fireworks seem<n>like they're wrapping
up.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Let's get back. The fireworks seem<n>like they're wrapping
up.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
When those two get a little bigger, I<n>would love to be able to
bring them<n>along to some festivals as well...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As Mejiro Dober gazes up at the<n>fireworks, she gives a
gentle smile. I<n>can tell that she loves and cares for<n>her
younger siblings very deeply.
